title: The Best Of Bollywood–Verified Silver Jewellery And How To Style It
text:
facebook 650 SHARES 
Owing to the consistent modern Indian narrative that our designers aren’t afraid to engage with, homegrown drives of style have become the norm. After endorsing banarasis and chanderis, it’s the turn of the quintessential Indian silver. Our leading ladies’ newly-acquired fearless style has them throw over the choicest of silver, over their deconstructed Indianwear. For those of us looking for some grandmom-approved street cred in their accessory game, here’s your lowdown on the seven best statement pieces. 1.Sonam Kapoor has the whole bohemian-Indian thing down in her tribal Anamika Khanna outfit, that has been styled with a navel-covering silver neckpiece (possibly an heirloom?). namratasoni/via Instagram 2.Raveena Tandon does full justice to her practical Anavila sari by finishing it out with big, fat silver jhumkis raveenatandon/via Instagram 3.Rakul Preet picks a patterned choker to pair with her all-white Tarun Tahiliani sari, and sports pulled-back hair for maximum impact. afashionistadiaries/via Instagram 
4.Malika Arora works her heavy-duty chandelier-style earrings with a printed Satya Paul sari, and sleeker-than–sleek hair. afashionistadiaries/via Instagram 5.Vidya Balan’s three-stringed matarmala gets the perfect companion in a solid-hued anarkali by Natasha J. vidyabalan/via Instagram 6.Tammannah’s mint-green Raw Mango lehenga gets a royal update with a bodice-covering neckpiece from Amrapali. 
sanjanabatra/via Instagram 
7.A sliver pendant was the best kind of addition on Swara Bhaskar’s cool-girl red maxi by Anita Dongre Grassroot. swarabhaskar/via Instagram
